casebody.data:
Harry Glen HALL and Charles B. Towns, Appellants, v. SELBY SHOE COMPANY and The Arch Preserver Shoe Shop, Inc., Appellees. No. 65. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit Nov. 7, 1938. Graef & Towns and L. Stewart Gatter, both óf New York City, for appellants. • Edmund P. Wood and Wood & Wood, all of Cincinnati, Ohio, and Allan C. Bake-well and Cooper, Kerr & Dunham, all of New York City,' for appellees.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
